abstract.t: In March 2001, [RFC 3077] was published and describes a protocolwhich allows to integrate unidirectional links in the Internet. Sincethen, a number of experimentations and deployements using thisprotocol have been led. This document presents various protocols,e.g. layer 2 and layer 3 protocols, which have been commonly usedover [RFC 3077] in a satellite environment. This document raisesissues for each of these protocols.
